mapper.select: select pb.id id, pb.name name, pb.first_letter firstLetter, pb.sort, pb.factory_status factoryStatus, pb.show_status showStatus, pb.product_count prodcutCount, pb.product_comment_count productCommentCount, pb.logo, pb.big_pic bigPic from sms_home_brand shb left join pms_brand pb on shb.brand_id = pb.id where shb.recommend_status = 1 and pb.show_status = 1 limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
